job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: at paypal nasdaq pypl we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone regardless of background or economic standing has access to affordable convenient and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives were a purposedriven company and our beliefs are the foundation of how we conduct business every day were guided by our core values of inclusion innovation collaboration and wellness collectively these values inspire us to work together as one team with our customers at the center of everything we do and to take care of ourselves each other and the communities in which we live and work we challenge the status quo ask questions and find solutions join us as we enable the hopes dreams and ambitions of millions of people around the worldltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob description summaryltbrgtltstronggtin support of paypals mission and social innovation priorities the paypal giving platform harnesses the power of our technology and scale to inspire giving around the world our products enable fundraising experiences that connect people businesses and nonprofits with their communities and move billions of dollars every year to hundreds of thousands of worthy causes we are looking for a full stack developer with experience in building highperforming scalable enterprisegrade applications as a member of the team you will help us build product solutions with outstanding quality we are always interested for strong technologists who are passionate to solve complex computer engineering problems in a repeatable and maintainable way you will build strong competencies in design data structures and algorithms along with a technical fascination for how everything ties togetherltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob descriptionltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtdeep familiarity with java java spring boot junit rest api sql maven ampamp git ltligtltligt years of working experience in software development with related technologiesltligtltligtable to take on and lead projects to drive deliverablesltligtltligtexpertise and work experience with objectoriented design and design patterns and programming skillsltligtltligtexpertise in high level design and translating them into detailed design artifactsltligtltligtexperience with database like mysql oracle mongo couchbaseltligtltligtperform detailed analysis and technical designsltligtltligtexpertise in secure coding practices and software engineering best practicesltligtltligtability to drive projects independentlyltligtltligtknowledge or experience of full stack development with nodejs is a plusltligtltligtsolid understanding of the pdlc life cycleltligtltligtexperience with test automation tdd unitintegrationfunctional testingltligtltligtdisciplined approach to testing and quality assuranceltligtltligthandson knowledge of version control systems such as gitltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtskills ampamp behaviorsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtcreative and innovative able to think out of the boxltligtltligttrack record as a results oriented person with a delivery focusltligtltligtstrong work ethic flexible and openmindedltligtltligtable to work with cross functional team in different timezoneltligtltligtenjoy fast paced dynamic environmentltligtltligtunderstand issues quickly and solve problems efficientlyltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtfor more than years paypal has remained at the forefront of the digital payment revolution by leveraging technology to make financial services and commerce more convenient affordable and secure our open digital payments platform gives paypals million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships paypal creates better ways to manage and move money and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments paying or getting paid available in more than markets around the world the paypal platform including braintree venmo and xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than currencies withdraw funds in currencies and hold balances in their paypal accounts in currenciesltbrgtltbrgtpaypal provides equal employment opportunity eeo to all persons regardless of age color national origin citizenship status physical or mental disability race religion creed gender sex pregnancy sexual orientation gender identity andor expression genetic
